results.overview: When an inner-city Miami schoolteacher gets her knee broken after standing up to the school's gang leader, her mercenary combat specialist boyfriend goes undercover as a substitute teacher to take down the punk. Soon he discovers a conspiracy of criminals at work, and must reassemble his team from his last jungle raid to stop them.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: When teacher Randall Thomasson is killed during a carjacking, an unexpected visitor shows up at his funeral - his estranged brother, Karl Thomasson. An ex-Green Beret turned mercenary, Karl signs on as a new substitute teacher in order to investigate Randall's murder.
results.title: The Substitute 2: School's Out

results.original_title: The Substitute: Failure Is Not an Option
results.overview: A former mercenary joins a military academy as a teacher. He soon discovers a neo-Nazi group, code-named Werewolves, formed among the cadets. He also quickly finds that they have military leadership among the officers at the Academy.
results.title: The Substitute: Failure Is Not an Option

results.overview: At a college visit to a war buddy's professor daughter, mercenary Treat Williams finds her brutally beaten. He then poses as a teacher to teach a lesson to the football jocks responsible.
results.title: The Substitute 3: Winner Takes All

results.overview: A high school substitute English teacher resorts to murder to protect her murderous dark past while seducing a student who begins to suspect her true identity.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: In the original movie, the cyborg-teachers were all destroyed. Well that's what we thought, but there's one more rogue military robot out there determined to clean up the education system.
results.title: Class of 1999 II - The Substitute

results.overview: In Nebraska, in pioneer days, a woman who knows she is going to die asks a prostitute to replace her with her husband and four children in order to make it possible for them to keep their family farm.
results.title: The Substitute Wife

results.overview: A guy house-sitting at a home based women's spa finds himself providing erotic services to female clients who mistake him for the substitute therapist.
results.title: The Sex Substitute

results.overview: A group of kids obsessed with playing video games mistakenly uncovers a plot by someone in their school to control the world.
results.title: The Substitute Spy

results.overview: A passionate substitute teacher must protect her disinterested class from an ancient curse.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: A young teacher takes a job at an unusual private school where she soon discovers that the boys have a sinister power over the girls. As the boys behaviour becomes increasingly threatening she uncovers the source of the girls fear; an ominous locked door at the back of the classroom.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: A warm friendship springs up between Quirkly and Helen, when the fireman saves the girl's life. In his desire to be near Helen, Quirkly obtains a room in the house where the girl telegrapher boards. Badger, a crook, stopping in the same house, learns that Quirkly is in the habit of carrying his savings in a bag suspended from his neck. Entering the room with a confederate, Badger chloroforms the fireman and steals the money. Helen hears the noise of the struggle, but comes too late to apprehend the crooks.
results.title: The Substitute Fireman

results.overview: 6th Grade gets a new substitute teacher. She wants to train the class for an international competition in Paris. But something isn't right. How is she able read kids' minds? Why is she so mean? And how does she manage to convince everyone's parents she is so great when the whole class knows she is really an alien?
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: A magazine article about a sex therapy clinic accidentally gives out the address and phone number of a failing bed and breakfast instead.
results.title: The Sex Substitute 2

results.overview: Lucio, a prestigious university professor, takes the position of substitute teacher at a high school in the suburbs of Buenos Aires, where he grew up. Through tales, novels and poetry, he tries to distract his class from the harsh reality of their everyday lives. But soon, he must step out of his professional duties when Dilan, one of his students, is threatened by a local drug kingpin.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: Simple story about the man who goes to the beach and uses inflatable objects for all of his needs.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: To compensate the loss of Lu’s brother, Lu, the captain of judo team at school, has been brought up by her mother as a substitute of her brother in Beijing. In the seemingly masculine appearance, she secretly falls in love with Nicole, the internet celebrity girl from Taiwan.  Lu and Nicole meet each other in a judo competition of which the winner would have the chance to become the leading actress in an action film. Nicole wins the competition, but she disappears right before the movie start shooting. As Nicole’s substitute, Lu then has the chance to play the leading actress of the action movie.  But the thing is, is Lu able to find her own self-identity and be the real her in one’s life?
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: Zohara has been waiting to go home ever since she was first stationed at a distant military base, but when the day arrives her hopes evaporate. The soldier sent to replace her appears to be suicidal. Instead of leaving, Zohara is ordered to guard the new girl.
results.title: The Substitute

results.overview: A new substitute teacher attempts to teach a class of 7th graders in a Swedish school. The class gives her a hard time, provoking her until she can no longer control her outrage.
results.title: The Substitute Teacher
